transcript: really early on in gim frers we were like about a million a month we go to this like operations coach and so he's like I want you both to write down everything you do on this whiteboard everything you do in the business we both write down everything that we do every single day and there's this column that says Alex and Lila he takes the marker and he circles like 90% of the things on the board and he's like Lea this is all yours this is Alex's and I was like I love this guy ilila is a pure operator like a pure Thoroughbred operator she's unbelievable and I usually operate best when I just have space and time and if I have space and time I come up with a couple good ideas it's just like hey what if we did this and then Lila's like I got it and then I guess Tak can care
